title: North Koreans tell BBC they are sent to work 'like slaves' in Russia
description: More than 50,000 North Koreans will be sent to work in Russia, as Moscow's war in Ukraine drains labour pools.
content:
Thousands of North Koreans are being sent to work in slave-like conditions in Russia to fill a huge labour shortage exacerbated by Russia's ongoing invasion of Ukraine, the BBC has learned.
Moscow has repeatedly turned to Pyongyang to help it fight t... [1252 chars]

title: Knee-replacement implant used on thousands of NHS patients known to be faulty for years
description: Patients say they were left immobile or addicted to painkillers after receiving the NexGen implant.
content:
Debbie Booker from Southampton had an operation to replace her left knee in 2016.
Although initially it appeared to have been successful, she started to experience severe pain a year later while on holiday in Majorca.
"I laid a bag of ice on my knee ... [1463 chars]

title: Warm weather and England’s Euros success lifted UK retail sales in July
description: Sunnier picture clouded by warning that mooted higher taxes could lead to shop closures and job losses
content:
Warmer weather and a series of sporting events lifted retail sales last month but retailers said the return to growth “barely touched the sides” and warned that mooted higher taxes would lead to shop closures and job losses.
Retail sales rose by 2.5%... [4416 chars]

title: Trump sparks concern after suggesting he might allow sales of Nvidia’s advanced AI chips in China
description: The president says he could ‘make a deal’ for Nvidia to sell a downgraded version of its flagship Blackwell chip in China
content: Donald Trump has suggested he might allow Nvidia to sell chips in China that are more technology advanced than currently permitted, despite deep-seated fears in Washington that Beijing could harness US artificial intelligence capabilities to supercha... [3163 chars]

title: Settlers and segregation: Inside the conflict forcing Palestinians from their homes
description: Settlers and segregation: Inside the conflict forcing Palestinians from their homes
content:
